Activity.description: An individual activity in a causal model, representing the individual molecular activity of a single gene product or complex in the context of a particular model

causal_associations.description: The causal associations that flow out of this activity

enabled_by.description: The gene product or complex that carries out the activity

has_input.description: The input molecules that are directly consumed by the activity

has_output.description: The output molecules that are directly produced by the activity

has_primary_input.description: The primary input molecule that is directly consumed by the activity

has_primary_output.description: The primary output molecule that is directly produced by the activity

id.description: Identifier of the activity unit. Should be in gocam namespace.

molecular_function.description: The molecular function that is carried out by the gene product or complex

occurs_in.description: The cellular location in which the activity occurs

part_of.description: The larger biological process in which the activity is a part

Activity.title: Activity

BiologicalProcessAssociation.description: An association between an activity and a biological process term

evidence.description: The set of evidence items that support the association.

happens_during.description: Optional extension describing where the BP takes place

part_of.description: Optional extension allowing hierarchical nesting of BPs

provenances.description: The set of provenance objects that provide metadata about who made the association.

term.description: The ontology term that describes the nature of the association

BiologicalProcessAssociation.title: BiologicalProcessAssociation

BiologicalProcessTermObject.description: A term object that represents a biological process term from GO
BiologicalProcessTermObject.title: BiologicalProcessTermObject

CausalAssociation.description: A causal association between two activities

downstream_activity.description: The activity unit that is downstream of this one

evidence.description: The set of evidence items that support the association.

predicate.description: The RO relation that represents the type of relationship

provenances.description: The set of provenance objects that provide metadata about who made the association.

CausalAssociation.title: CausalAssociation

CausalPredicateEnum.description: A term describing the causal relationship between two activities. All terms are drawn from the "causally upstream or within" (RO:0002418) branch of the Relation Ontology (RO).
enum: causally upstream of or within, negative effect
causally upstream of or within, positive effect
CausalPredicateEnum.title: CausalPredicateEnum

CellTypeAssociation.description: An association between an activity and a cell type term

evidence.description: The set of evidence items that support the association.

provenances.description: The set of provenance objects that provide metadata about who made the association.

term.description: The ontology term that describes the nature of the association

CellTypeAssociation.title: CellTypeAssociation

CellTypeTermObject.description: A term object that represents a cell type term from CL
CellTypeTermObject.title: CellTypeTermObject

CellularAnatomicalEntityAssociation.description: An association between an activity and a cellular anatomical entity term

evidence.description: The set of evidence items that support the association.

part_of.description: Optional extension allowing hierarchical nesting of CCs

provenances.description: The set of provenance objects that provide metadata about who made the association.

term.description: The ontology term that describes the nature of the association

CellularAnatomicalEntityAssociation.title: CellularAnatomicalEntityAssociation

CellularAnatomicalEntityEnum.description: A term from the subset of the cellular anatomical entity branch of GO CC
CellularAnatomicalEntityEnum.title: CellularAnatomicalEntityEnum

CellularAnatomicalEntityTermObject.description: A term object that represents a cellular anatomical entity term from GO
CellularAnatomicalEntityTermObject.title: CellularAnatomicalEntityTermObject

EnabledByGeneProductAssociation.description: An association between an activity and an individual gene product

evidence.description: The set of evidence items that support the association.

provenances.description: The set of provenance objects that provide metadata about who made the association.

term.description: A "term" that is an entity database object representing an individual gene product.

EnabledByGeneProductAssociation.title: EnabledByGeneProductAssociation

EnabledByProteinComplexAssociation.description: An association between an activity and a protein complex, where the complex carries out the activity. This should only be used when the activity cannot be attributed to an individual member of the complex, but instead the function is an emergent property of the complex.

evidence.description: The set of evidence items that support the association.

members.description: The gene products that are part of the complex

provenances.description: The set of provenance objects that provide metadata about who made the association.

term.description: The gene product or complex that carries out the activity

EnabledByProteinComplexAssociation.title: EnabledByProteinComplexAssociation

EvidenceCodeEnum.description: A term from the subset of ECO that maps up to a GAF evidence code
EvidenceCodeEnum.title: EvidenceCodeEnum

EvidenceItem.description: An individual piece of evidence that is associated with an assertion in a model

provenances.description: Provenance about the assertion, e.g. who made it

reference.description: The publication of reference that describes the evidence

term.description: The ECO term representing the type of evidence

EvidenceItem.title: EvidenceItem

EvidenceTermObject.description: A term object that represents an evidence term from ECO. Only ECO terms that map up to a GO GAF evidence code should be used.
EvidenceTermObject.title: EvidenceTermObject

GeneProductTermObject.description: A term object that represents a gene product term from GO or UniProtKB
GeneProductTermObject.title: GeneProductTermObject

GrossAnatomicalStructureTermObject.description: A term object that represents a gross anatomical structure term from UBERON
GrossAnatomicalStructureTermObject.title: GrossAnatomicalStructureTermObject

GrossAnatomyAssociation.description: An association between an activity and a gross anatomical structure term

evidence.description: The set of evidence items that support the association.

provenances.description: The set of provenance objects that provide metadata about who made the association.

term.description: The ontology term that describes the nature of the association

GrossAnatomyAssociation.title: GrossAnatomyAssociation

InformationBiomacromoleculeCategory.description: A term describing the type of the enabler of an activity.
InformationBiomacromoleculeCategory.title: InformationBiomacromoleculeCategory

Model.description: A model of a biological program consisting of a set of causally connected activities.

activities.description: All of the activities that are part of the model

additional_taxa.description: Additional taxa that the model is about

date_modified.description: The date that the model was last modified

id.description: The identifier of the model. Should be in gocam namespace.

objects.description: All of the objects that are part of the model. This includes terms as well as publications and database objects like gene. This is not strictly part of the data managed by the model, it is for convenience, and should be refreshed from outside.

query_index.description: An optional object that contains the results of indexing a model with various summary statistics and retrieval indices.

status.description: The status of the model in terms of its progression along the developmental lifecycle

taxon.description: The primary taxon that the model is about

title.description: The human-readable descriptive title of the model

Model.title: Model

ModelStateEnum.description: A term describing where the model is in the development life cycle.
ModelStateEnum.title: ModelStateEnum

MolecularFunctionAssociation.description: An association between an activity and a molecular function term

evidence.description: The set of evidence items that support the association.

provenances.description: The set of provenance objects that provide metadata about who made the association.

term.description: The ontology term that describes the nature of the association

MolecularFunctionAssociation.title: MolecularFunctionAssociation

MolecularFunctionTermObject.description: A term object that represents a molecular function term from GO
MolecularFunctionTermObject.title: MolecularFunctionTermObject

MoleculeAssociation.description: An association between an activity and a molecule term

evidence.description: The set of evidence items that support the association.

provenances.description: The set of provenance objects that provide metadata about who made the association.

term.description: The ontology term that describes the nature of the association

MoleculeAssociation.title: MoleculeAssociation

MoleculeTermObject.description: A term object that represents a molecule term from CHEBI or UniProtKB
MoleculeTermObject.title: MoleculeTermObject

Object.description: An abstract class for all identified objects in a model
Object.title: Object

PhaseEnum.description: A term from either the phase branch of GO or the phase branch of an anatomy ontology
PhaseEnum.title: PhaseEnum

PhaseTermObject.description: A term object that represents a phase term from GO or UBERON
PhaseTermObject.title: PhaseTermObject

PredicateTermObject.description: A term object that represents a taxon term from NCBITaxon
PredicateTermObject.title: PredicateTermObject

ProteinComplexTermObject.description: A term object that represents a protein complex term from GO
ProteinComplexTermObject.title: ProteinComplexTermObject

PublicationObject.description: An object that represents a publication or other kind of reference
PublicationObject.title: PublicationObject

QueryIndex.description: An index that is optionally placed on a model in order to support common query or index operations. Note that this index is not typically populated in the working transactional store for a model, it is derived via computation from core primary model information.

end_activities.description: The set of activities that are the end points of the model, i.e. those that have no outgoing causal associations.

flattened_references.description: All publication objects from the model across different levels combined in one place

intermediate_activities.description: The set of activities that are neither start nor end activities, i.e. those that have both incoming and outgoing causal associations.

length_of_longest_causal_association_pat.description: The maximum number of hops along activities along the direction of causal flow in a model.

model_activity_enabled_by_closure.description: The reflexive transitive closure of `model_activity_enabled_by_terms`, over the is_a and part_of relationship types

model_activity_enabled_by_genes.description: All direct enabler genes and genes that are part of enabler complexes for all activities

model_activity_enabled_by_rollup.description: The rollup of `model_activity_enabled_by_closure` to a GO subset or slim.

model_activity_enabled_by_terms.description: All direct enabler terms for all activities

model_activity_has_input_closure.description: The reflexive transitive closure of `model_activity_has_input_terms`, over the is_a relationship type

model_activity_has_input_rollup.description: The rollup of `model_activity_has_input_closure` to a GO subset or slim.

model_activity_has_input_terms.description: All direct input terms for all activities

model_activity_molecular_function_closur.description: The reflexive transitive closure of `model_activity_molecular_function_terms`, over the is_a relationship

model_activity_molecular_function_rollup.description: The rollup of `model_activity_molecular_function_closure` to a GO subset or slim.

model_activity_molecular_function_terms.description: All MF terms for all activities

model_activity_occurs_in_closure.description: The reflexive transitive closure of `model_activity_occurs_in_terms`, over the is_a and part_of relationship type

model_activity_occurs_in_rollup.description: The rollup of `model_activity_occurs_in_closure` to a GO subset or slim.

model_activity_occurs_in_terms.description: All direct cellular component localization terms for all activities

model_activity_part_of_closure.description: The reflexive transitive closure of `model_activity_part_of_terms`, over the is_a and part_of relationship type

model_activity_part_of_rollup.description: The rollup of `model_activity_part_of_closure` to a GO subset or slim.

model_activity_part_of_terms.description: All direct biological process terms for all activities

model_taxon.description: The primary taxon term for the model, over the NCBITaxon:subClassOf relationship type. This is used to determine the primary taxon that the model is relevant to.

model_taxon_closure.description: The reflexive transitive closure of the taxon term for the model, over the NCBITaxon:subClassOf relationship type. This is used to determine the set of taxa that are relevant to the model.

model_taxon_rollup.description: The rollup of the taxon closure to a NCBITaxon subset or slim.

number_of_activities.description: The number of activities in a model.

number_of_causal_associations.description: Total number of causal association edges connecting activities in a model.

number_of_enabled_by_terms.description: The number of molecular entities or sets of entities in a model.

number_of_end_activities.description: The number of end activities in a model

number_of_intermediate_activities.description: The number of intermediate activities in a model

number_of_singleton_activities.description: The number of singleton activities in a model

number_of_start_activities.description: The number of start activities in a model

number_of_strongly_connected_components.description: The number of distinct components that consist of activities that are connected (directly or indirectly) via causal connections. Most models will consist of a single SCC. Some models may consist of two or more "islands" where there is no connection from one island to another.

singleton_activities.description: The set of activities that have no causal associations, i.e. those that are not connected to any other activity in the model.

start_activities.description: The set of activities that are the starting points of the model, i.e. those that have no incoming causal associations.

taxon_label.description: The label of the primary taxon for the model

QueryIndex.title: QueryIndex

TaxonTermObject.description: A term object that represents a taxon term from NCBITaxon
TaxonTermObject.title: TaxonTermObject
